With our wallet, you maintain full control of your funds and private keysâ€”no intermediaries, no compromises. The integrated Tor network adds an extra layer of privacy, masking your IP address and encrypting your online activities to protect against tracking and surveillance.

Download now to enjoy a seamless, private, and secure Ethereum wallet experience directly from your browser.
